data.title: Levi Zendt: A Song For The 1978 TV Miniseries â€˜Centennialâ€™ (Parody of Roxanne by Arizona Zervas) â€“ Mel's Music â€“ Podcast
data.meta_description: Levi Zendt: A Song For the 1978 TV Miniseries â€˜Centennialâ€™ (Parody of Roxanne by Arizona Zervas)  Original by Arizona Zervas & Lauren LaRue  Lyrics:  All for his farm. People love his farm,  So wait, sit. Centennial made a name for this man:  Levi Zendt, Levi Zendt. He married Elly first, later Lucinda. In the wild west, Follow Levi Zendt. Founded Zentâ€™s Farm to feed his family. He befriended Seccombe. He befriended Brumbaugh. He created order, where there was so much chaos. Levi Zendt, Levi Zendt.  He married Elly first, later Lucinda.  Started out shunned by his family. A girl lying about rape, tried to ruin him. He wouldnâ€™t let that put him to a stop. Had too much motivation to sit & plop. Found a workaround, and picked Elly up. Threatned her captors at gunpoint, to give her up. He bought a wagon, no bells, Colorado bound. Money from Ellyâ€™s sister Laura Lou to get emâ€™ out of town. A fresh start, so new;...â€“ Escucha Levi Zendt: A Song For The 1978 TV Miniseries â€˜Centennialâ€™ (Parody of Roxanne by Arizona Zervas) por Mel's Music instantÃ¡neamente en tu tablet, telÃ©fono o navegador - no necesita descargas.
data.text:
Happy Fatherâ€™s Day: Iâ€™m So Thankful To Have You As My Dad, Robert Martinek!!!!!

(Tribute to Cinderella by Steven Curtis Chapman)

Original written by Steven Curtis Chapman

Lyrics:

He cuts, & he pastes

Edits my words before they see light of day

With my Mom, Karen, brought me home

His new baby girl

Today, Iâ€™m standing here breathing

Because he took on my lifeâ€™s problems like boulders ~

With his Grandpuppy, he plays

Dad, know your Laika Girl loves you too

Youâ€™re the King of your yard

To Archimedes, you nurture

Your care, it shines through

Thereâ€™s a Mall of America

On the other side of the country

Youâ€™re there, delighted

You traded in divorce ministry for the Mayo Clinicâ€™s radiation

Like you, Iâ€™ll drop to my knees

And beg you, for me, hang in there, please

Iâ€™m so thankful to have you as my Dad,

Robert Martinek!!!!!

You make my best days feel long ~

Your love, it grows

When you say my childhood name of boundy instead of spoon~

(So oh oh, oh oh oh)

To the best Father-Daughter dance

Iâ€™ll sing this one acapella

Spinning like Cinderella, the clockâ€™s hands dance

Second to years...going going gone

You taught me this truth:

Our Heavenly Father loves us

He saved us through Jesus, His Son!!!!!

You adore Adam, my white knight

Your blessing, Iâ€™ve continually cherished

You want to know when those Easter eggs of mine are going to hatch

Already such a great Grand-Paw with our pups Laika and her sister Newty

But right now, you need the Mayo Clinicâ€™s radiation

Like you, Iâ€™ll drop down to my knees

And beg you, for me, hang in there, please

Iâ€™m so thankful to have you as my Dad,

Robert Martinek!!!!!

You make my best days feel long ~

Your love, it grows

When you say my childhood name of boundy instead of spoon~

(So oh oh, oh oh oh)

To the best Father-Daughter dance

Iâ€™ll sing this one acapella

Spinning like Cinderella, the clockâ€™s hands dance

Seconds turn to years...going going gone

You taught me this truth:

Our Heavenly Father loves us

He saved us through Jesus, His Son~

He saved us through Jesus, His Son~

Youâ€™ve never once called me in Rochester dismayed

In God, you trust in His plan

Youâ€™re growing while hurting

To help your pain, youâ€™re accompanied by my awesome brother Dan

You tell me the life expectancy guesses say youâ€™re still years away

But without you, Iâ€™m hiding in corners, uncontrollably crying

Like you, Iâ€™ll drop to my knees

And beg you, for me, hang in there, please

Iâ€™m so thankful to have you as my Dad,

Robert Martinek!!!!!

You make my best days feel long~

Your love, it grows

When you say my childhood name of boundy instead of spoon~

(So oh oh, oh oh oh)

To the best Father-Daughter dance

Iâ€™ll sing this one acapella

Spinning like Cinderella, the clockâ€™s hands dance

Seconds to years...going going gone

You taught me this truth:

Our Heavenly Father loves us

He saved us through Jesus, His Son

End

wordplay

But until then, you Tots, Iâ€™ll just keep visiting :D

You never break

At the jog-a-thon

So quickly, you climb

Scaling slide hillâ€™s rock walls

Forever, Watch Jerichoâ€™s Walls Keep Falling

Lyrics:

Moses left this Earth

Joshua was next in line

God told him:

Be courageous

Because lead, he would

With his heartâ€™s motives right

Used Rahabâ€™s scarlet rope

Protected her new friends

Who would have conceived it

That in Christâ€™s bloodline

She would fit right in?

Picture Canaan: the land of milk and honey

Moses watching this sought after place in his last moments breathing

His people claim it after his death, mourning

His dreams for his people finally fulfilledl!!!

Forever, watch Jerichoâ€™s walls keep falling

Praise God, when the waters of our lives, God keeps parting

Through the Holy Spirit, feel

How holy our God is in His Word and to His creative creations

Heâ€™s knocking down Jerichoâ€™s walls

They keep falling

Have faith like a mustard seed

To get our mountains moving

To make our problems get gone

God will steal our pains and heal

Teach us that, in His eyes, weâ€™re already chosen

Forever, watch Jerichoâ€™s walls keep falling

Falling

Chosen

Chosen

Keep praying

Praying

In devotion

Devotion

Heâ€™s continually, at our hearth, stirring up love to rekindle

When we worship Him

Heâ€™s the dove in our bramble

Heâ€™s the desire behind each genuine spark

He flows freely like a fountain

Into a million different angels

My sandaled Savior

Go spread His peace

From His Good News letters

Slain, but still our living Father

Sharing keys to help us love each other

He forgives: Heâ€™s our answer!

Yeah, Heâ€™s God

From Him, we must not fracture

Struck by grace, reborn

He would cleanse us until, like snow, weâ€™re shining brighter

Cloathed in righteousness

He is the â€œIâ€ in â€œI amâ€

Give Him our all

Because He is both God and man

Forever, watch Jerichoâ€™s walls keep falling

Through the Holy Spirit, feel

To get our mountains moving

To make our problems get gone

God will steal our pains and heal

Teach us that, in His eyes, weâ€™re already chosen

Forever, watch Jerichoâ€™s walls keep falling

Falling

Weâ€™re chosen

Chosen

Keep praying

Praying

In devotion

Devotion

Forever, watch Jerichoâ€™s walls keep falling

Praise God, when the waters of our lives, God keeps parting

Through the Holy Spirit, feel

How holy our God is in His Word and to His creative creations

Heâ€™s knocking down Jerichoâ€™s walls

They keep falling

Have faith like a mustard seed

To get our mountains moving

To make our problems get gone

God will steal our pains and heal

Teach us that, in His eyes, weâ€™re already chosen

Forever, watch Jerichoâ€™s walls keep falling

New Meaning~ Happy Belated 6th Birthday, Oliver!!!! (Tribute to Greedy by Tate McRae)

*Oliver,

Wave goodbye to 5; your age is now counted on 2 hands!!! Love you for eternity, Kiddo; Happy Belated (adult for late) Birthday present!!!

Love

Your Lissa

**Original written by: Amy Allen, Jasper Harris, Ryan Tedder, & Tate McRae

Lyrics:

Yup, yup, yup

Yup, yup

Yup, yup

Yup, yup

Yup, yup

Yup, yup, yup

He knows how to be honest and mysterious

Eyes tell on him when he lies

But heâ€™s too cute for me not to help

From zoos to aquariums, he runs

Who wouldnâ€™t be influenced by his sad pout?

He leads me through fun fun fun tunnels

Down slides

Museums, parks, and pods

Time together always magically swell

He teaches me about God, sharing, forgiveness, brotherhood

From spending time with him these past 6 years

My life forever has new meaning

Oliver Sweetness

Playful, keeps pace with that energy bunny

He and his brother Miles

Keep sprint sprint

sprinting

He swims like a fish

Loves his teacher

Credits God

& is learning how to spell

Heâ€™s a treasure

I can tell

Yup, yup, yup

Yup, yup

Yup, yup

When he asks a question, heâ€™s being dead serious

Wants the real answer

So he knows how to react with grace

He loves with everything inside of him

Growing so tall at 6

Probably twice as tall at 12

Plus a sage

No more piggy back rides

Grew too tall

He wisely said

Had too many of those birthdays

With him, web climbing is a must

Pulling him down from rope walls

From spending time with him over these past 6 years

My life forever has new meaning

Thank you, Oliver Sweetness

Playful, keeps pace with that energy bunny

He and his brother Miles

Keep sprint sprint

sprinting

He swims like a fish

Loves his teacher

Credits God

& is learning how to spell

How to spell

Often understands adults

With surprising vocabulary & understanding of emotional context

Not attention seeking

Rather, attention giving

Like a fountain

So much kindness bursting forth

In this well

Heâ€™s empathetic

Plus calming

Thoughtful, but with reason

On me, heâ€™s forever cast his spell

Read it on my lips

Itâ€™s not an act

Listen

From spending these past 6 years with him

My life forever has new meaning

Oliver Sweetness

Playful, keeps pace with that energy bunny

He and his brother Miles

Keep sprint sprint

sprinting

He swims like a fish

Loves his teacher

Credits God

& is learning how to spell

Heâ€™s a treasure

I can tell

Spending these past 6 years with him, he changed my life

I can tell

Spending these past 6 years with him, Iâ€™m impressed heâ€™s in so many ways swell

I can already tell

From spending these past 6 years with him, my life is changed

I can tell

From spending these past 6 years with him, my life forever has been blessed

I can tell

Yup, yup

Yup, yup, yup

Yup, yup

Yup, yup

Yup, yup,

Yup, yup, yup

For My Newty Girl, I Still Cry / Am Never Saying Goodbye

(Tribute to Last Night by Morgan Wallen)

**Original written by: Ashley Gorley, Jacob Kasher Hindlin, John Byron, & Ryan Vojtesak

*** A huge thank you to both Adam & Aaron for taking Newt in, for saving & forever changing her life, and for introducing me to the kindest and sweetest soul I have ever known in my entire life!!! She was just like Mary Poppins â€œpractically perfect in every which way,â€ with a strong love for people, walks, construction paper, treats, Adam always, snow and leaves, chick flicks on tv, pets, playing with Mr. Moose, sunbathing, Kiddos, sticks, and rabbits : D

Lyrics:

For my Newty Girl, I cry

Missing her booty shaking

walks

She had a way of speaking without words

We didnâ€™t need them to talk

Ear wobbles and grunts to tell me where to go

Oh, the world, they meant

My Christmas tree in one piece

This year, she didnâ€™t get to knock it over

& Iâ€™ll never forget

Love her forever

Storm door frights

Paper piled high, all ripped

My sweet little shredder

Pawing at me

Against her charms, totally helpless

Ear wobbling for walks

Our early morning trips

Without her, time feels like a sink

Drip, drip, drip...

Achuâ€™

Without her, these tears down my cheeks just fly

This house doesnâ€™t feel like home to me

Without her

Nothing feels festive, you see...

For my Baby Girl, Newty, I still cry

Missing her booty shaking

walks

She had a way of speaking without words

We didnâ€™t use them to talk

Ear wobbles and grunts to tell me where to go

Oh, the world, they meant

My Christmas tree in one piece

This year, she didnâ€™t get to knock it over

I wonâ€™t forget

For my Cookie, Newty, I still cry

To my wonderful Newty Girl, Iâ€™ll never say goodbye

For my My Notey Goil, I still cry

Boneyard not put up

Her last cookie under the Christmas tree

Hiding them for her was always a must

Adam, her dog Daddy

No one, more, she loved

Kicking, in her dreams, with delight

Even sleeping Newt, I loved!!!

So why?

Why does this pain in my heart explode?

Our friends comfort us the best they can

But they canâ€™t bring her back

It kills me just to think...

For my Nudie Budie, I cry

Missing her booty shaking

walks

She had a way of speaking without words

We didnâ€™t need them to talk

Ear wobbles and grunts to tell me where to go

Oh, the world, they meant

My Christmas tree in one piece

This year, she didnâ€™t get to knock it over

& I refuse to forget

For my Baby Girl, Newty,

Only 2 barks

Influential sweetnesses in my Pup

Her treat box stabs my heart

When I walk by it

Deep inhales, I have to breathe in, good luck...

Sheâ€™s pawing at me in my favorite memories

Begging me for more longie pets

Oh, Newty, Honey, New-tie

My-Newt, not so minute

Her love; it never ends

Waiting for Adam at the door

But she was also mine

She was always waiting for Adam at the door

But she was also mine

I know she loved us

But she left this Earth

Took her final breath

It kills me, kills me

My Christmas tree in one piece

This season, she didnâ€™t get to knock it over yet

& I canâ€™t forget

For my Baby Girl, Newt, I still cry

For my Newty Tooty Fresh Nâ€™ Fruity, I will never say goodbye

End

(Tribute to Speed Drive by Charli XCX)

*Original written by: Charlotte Aitchison, David James Parker, EASYFUN, Ewart Everton Brown, Fabian Peter Torsson, Joakim Frans Ahlund, Klas Ã…lund, Michael Chapman, Nicky Chinn, Patrik Knut Arve, Sylvia Robinson, & Troy Rami

**Happy 7th Birthday, Eden; no song could ever capture your coolness, so please accept this bouquet of clumsy words as a 7th Birthday gift representing my love for You, Angel Pro & Lightning Bugâ£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£

Yo yo

Yo yo

For my Eden

Sheâ€™ll always be my Girl

Sheâ€™s playing her Pink Gun in Roblox Sheâ€™s already a pro

Her love is kind

Artistically, colors beautifully

Remember this time in life

But already loves to share

Say, hey, Eden:

Her love is kind

Itâ€™s so kind

Virtually fixes me until Iâ€™m upright

Eating Mac & cheese

Artistically, colors beautifully

And remember this time in life

When I oof, she grabs my screen from me

Virtually fixes me until Iâ€™m upright

Eating Mac & cheese

Artistically, colors beautifully

7 life, 7 life, 7 life, 7 life

7 life, 7 life, 7 life, 7 life

That 7 life, 7 life, 7 life, 7 life, bam :D

**Thank you to fellow monster lovers

Miles Porter & his beloved Mommy Lauren; this song is dedicated to both of you â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£â£

So must I

For food, diamonds, relics, & crystals

But even if I had millions of golden coins and monster compositions, when

writeâ€¦writeâ€¦right!

(Tribute to Run by OneRepublic)

Original written by: Brent Kutzle, John Nathaniel, Ryan Tedder, & Tyler Spry

Lyrics:

Write, write, write,

Write, write, write,

Write, right!

And read, read, read

Read, read, read,

Read, read

Back as a small kid

Learning to get witty

Mom and Dad taught me to write write, write, write, right!

Caring about the greats

Their books too funny

Plugged in

And Mom called me Hun, Hun, Hun, Hun, Hun

She told me the world out thereâ€™s tough

So make your art bold

Listen for the pitter patter of footsteps

Theyâ€™re foretold

Carve out fairy tales

Cause youâ€™re in one

Girl, you need to write, write, write, write, right!

So write, write, right!

Write, write, write,

Write, write, write,

Write, right!

And read, read, read

Read, read, read,

Read, read

As I was a young kid

Uniformed at the ready

With books in all my bag

bag, bag, bag, bags
